programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Rupert Flies To Cheddar Moon - When Ping Pong uses her magic to turn Rupert's pedal car into a spaceship they fly to the moon. There they meet the Man on the Moon who runs a cheese stall.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Rupert And The Giant Egg Race - It's the day of the Nutwood Egg and Spoon race but Raggety has magically turned Ping Pong into a giant egg. How can Ruprt and the friends have their race now?

programme.title: My Life Me Ep11
programme.desc: The Raffi Raffle - The girls “steal” Liam's fundraising to raffle off Raffi. Unfortunately, Principal Lemmon, who hates anything remotely fun is on Birch and Sandra's trail as the two girls try to pull off a successful fundraiser and complete part of their civics studies.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep12
programme.desc: Crushed - An unsigned note puts Birch into detective mode. With Sandra standing by to ridicule her, Birch tries to lure her shy admirer into the open. Will the guy secretly crushing on Birch be revealed or will Sandra get the last laugh?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep63
programme.desc: Stingo'S Naughty Day - Stingo is bored and plays all manner of naughty tricks on the other tots. Fifi teaches Stingo that he will have more fun if he helps people rather than being mean to them.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep64
programme.desc: Shrinking Pip - The Tots are all measuring themselves. Pip hasn't grown much since he was last measured. How can he grow into a big strong gooseberry?

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Give Peas A Chance - Wilbur passes a law to increase the healthy eating in Beanotown, replacing all foods with peas…of the mushy variety! The gang must avoid the people of Beanotown who are rapidly transforming into Zompeas, from the over consumption of the addictive green goo. Dennis uses the only un-mushed peas in town to sabotage Wilbur’s mush making factory and save the day!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep12
programme.desc: The Fan - Walter attempts to sabotage The Dinmakers' chance of reaching fame. He will stop at nothing - even wearing a frock, becoming Wanda and pretending to LOVE Dennis in order to break up the band!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep6
programme.desc: Fall Of The Castle Of Lions - When a Galra Commander infiltrates the castle and destroys its power crystal, the team must protect Voltron from falling into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Kylie Kangeroo-Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Dog-Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Dinosaur Park-To celebrate Freddy Fox's birthday, the children go on a trip to a Dinosaur Park. With Grampy Rabbit as their leader, they follow dinosaur footprints to find Freddy's birthday treat.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep135
programme.desc: The Remember-ator-Froga can't seem to remember anything today! Even her piano lesson with Christopher! S+he decides to put sticky notes all around the house as reminders. But it is not very convenient! Bubu offers to be her reminder, friends the best reminders of all!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep136
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt-Froga organizes a treasure hunt for her friends! Everyone is enthusiastic, except Ron is not with them. Froga realises the treasure has now disappeared. When the treasure hunters have finally found Ron, they also found him..with the missing treasure!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep303
programme.desc: No Time Like The Present Store-At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Pups Save the Land Pirates / Pups Save the Birdwatching Turbots-Pirates Alex, Julia, Julius and Chick-ARR-letta, are sent sailing into the desert and got lost! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save these Land pirates. // Cap'n Turbot and Francois chirp for help when a bird-watching contest leaves them up in the air.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Pups Save a Tightrope Walker-Francois Turbot is bravely walking a tightrope, but seagulls threaten to ruin his act. Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Best Fin-Ship Day-Baby Shark tries to give William the best Best Fin-ship Day ever.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Great Skate Case-When Vola's skatefish board goes missing before a big event, Detective Baby Shark and William Watson are on the case.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Captain Steel / Wash Out-Whilst some of the Deer Squad down with flu, Sir Steel tries to become a superhero with disastrous results. // Sir Steel 'borrows' water from Crystal Lake for his Water Park in the city, but things soon go wrong!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost-Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's café, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Paddington and the Big Decision-On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan & Judy can't agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep111
programme.desc: CAKE-tastrophe!-When a hungry Crusher accidentally turns the baker truck’s baker bots to messy mode, they sprout wheels and drive away! It’s up to AJ and Blaze to track down all the rampaging robots before Axle City is blanketed in baked goods.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Mystery Bandit-When a mysterious bandit makes off with Blaze’s metallic trophy, he must track down the culprit in this preschool whodunit!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep999
programme.desc: Pirate Play Along Adventure-Santiago, Lorelai, and Tomás want YOU to join their crew! Play along to see if you have what it takes to be a good pirate.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Busy Baby-Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep603
programme.desc: A Giant Harvest Day!-Holiday Cooks Molly and Gil, on a mission to save the town's Harvest Day (Thanksgiving) feast, must retrieve a Golden Tomato from magical Tall Tale Farms. But first, their food knowledge is tested by three guardians!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The SS Friendship!-Captain Deemo (Deema) and First Mate Gil pilot their steampunk sub to different ocean habitats so they can deliver Friendship Day Bubblegrams to all their friends. But along the way, they find themselves being chased by a Kraken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday-Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost-Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Work and Play-When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow-Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Collection-Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. The others have all one sticks, bubbles, sounds, tools. They help Anna to find her memories with her friends

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Fixing Things-Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Tenderest Bond of All-While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild-Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Big News with Blue-Blue has something exciting to tell everybody! In this game of Blue's Clues, Josh and the viewer go on a note finding quest, solving riddles, and following treasure maps to find out the answer to Blue's Big News.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Zeg and the Egg-Zeg is out smashing things with Blaze and AJ when he finds a tiny dinosaur egg. Now the three friends must embark on an epic journey across a prehistoric landscape to return the egg to its Truckodactyl mother.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep810
programme.desc: Pups and Katie Stop the Barking Kitty Crew! / Pups Save the Glasses-When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his "barking" kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town. // Cap'n Turbot loses his glasses and creates chaos in his path. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save him and his specs!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep811
programme.desc: Pups vs. A Neon Humdinger / Pups Save A Royal Painting-When Mayor Humdinger's giant neon sign of himself gets loose, the Paw Patrol must stop it from rolling through town. // Sweetie steals a painting of the Princess and attempts to replace it with one of herself.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Meteor Mayhem / Dance Of Destruction-A meteor is heading for earth and Sir Steel's heroic efforts only make the Deer Squad's job in saving the planet even harder! // A dance competition in the Central Forest turns chaotic when Sir Steel uses his monkey suit to beat Rammy in the final.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Ducknado-Sir Steel's super powerful hairdryer creates a giant tornado that sucks up Ian, his ducklings and a heap of other things.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost-Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's café, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector-It's snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat given him by Aunt Lucy and must find it. // Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost-Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play-Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run-Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing-Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep309
programme.desc: The Arctic Life!-Brrrr! The Arctic sure is cold-probably because it's filled with so many cool animals! After meeting Arctic Dan, Gil embarks on an icy expedition. With the Guppies' help, can Gil brave the elements to reach the North Pole?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Blue's Big Neighborhood Adventure-Josh and Blue are Neighborhood Heroes, helping everyone they meet as they explore our neighborhood. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go in the neighborhood and make very important stop to make pizza with Mr. Oregano!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep216
programme.desc: It's YOUR Birthday-It's YOUR birthday! DJ Slip has the music, Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are making a very special birthday cake, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play at your party! As we celebrate, we play games and gather prizes for a pinata!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Big Rig Blaze-When a windstorm blows away the supplies for Stripes' Animal Party, Blaze transforms into the one Monster Machine strong enough to haul it all back - a Big Rig! There's nothing he can't pull with that Big Rig Force!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep999
programme.desc: Pirate Play Along Adventure-Santiago, Lorelai, and Tomás want YOU to join their crew! Play along to see if you have what it takes to be a good pirate.

programme.desc: Sink or Swim-The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Pups and the Beanstalk / Pups Save the Turbots-Rubble decides to nap under a tree at Farmer Yumi’s when suddenly Adventure Bay gets a huge problem - Alex the Giant! // When Cap'n Turbot needs to get a picture of a rare bird, his French cousin decides to help but gets caught on a cliff!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Paddington and The House Guest / Paddington and The Banana-Mr. Curry is invited by Paddington to stay with the Browns whilst his flooded house is being repaired. He thinks the Browns are too disorganized. // Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the café without paying for it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Edmond Elephant's Birthday-Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep517
programme.desc: Bedtime Story-Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Lost Keys-After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a very deep drain.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep137
programme.desc: The Mystery Present-Bubu, Froga and Anna are looking for Anna's Ukulele, a bouncy ball and another item belonging to Froga. When searching, they find a beautiful present. Why is it here? Who is it for? What's inside? Our friends are planning to find out!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep138
programme.desc: The Friendship Bouquet-Froga is devastated because her sunflowers have withered in her garden and she cannot make her annual sunflower bouquet. Luckily, Anna, with her friends, searches for a solution to replace Froga's cherished sunflowers with something better!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Barbazoo Can't Say ''No'' / The Doppelganger-Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Building with Blue-Josh invites YOU to be a part of the construction crew! Blue and Magenta are building something special, and we need to play Blue and Magenta's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Dora the Explorer S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Dora's Dance to the Rescue-Put on your dancing shoes, because Dora needs you to spin, shake wiggle, jump and clap with her as she tries to rescue Swiper the fox, who's been trapped inside a bottle by a mean dancing elf.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Gravity Calamity / Ball of Chaos-Sir Steel gets Professor Scratch to create an anti-gravity ray, which goes wrong in the hands of Ricardo! // Muffin's super bouncy ball threatens to wreck the annual Winter Festival! Kai learns to sacrifice something he loves for the greater good!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector-It's snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat given him by Aunt Lucy and must find it. // Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Paddington Runs the Café / Paddington Makes a Film-Paddington says he will watch the cafe, so Matteo can play with Jonathan and Judy in the park. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor Gardens to send to Aunt Lucy in the retired home for Bears in Lima.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Zeg and the Egg-Zeg is out smashing things with Blaze and AJ when he finds a tiny dinosaur egg. Now the three friends must embark on an epic journey across a prehistoric landscape to return the egg to its Truckodactyl mother.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Gasquatch-Blaze and AJ are deep in the woods when they discover and befriend a mud-loving monster truck named Gasquatch. Now, they must set out on an epic adventure to bring their new friend to Mud Fest… the muddiest party of all time.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep999
programme.desc: Pirate Play Along Adventure-Santiago, Lorelai, and Tomás want YOU to join their crew! Play along to see if you have what it takes to be a good pirate.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma-Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Holiday Parties!-In Holiday Land, there's a town for every holiday...that is, until Pirate Myra uses Wizard Grouper's magic wand to turn every town into Pirate Town! Will Molly and Gil be able to restore Holiday Land back to normal?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Winter Sports Chompetition!-Gil and Bubble Puppy are competing in the Winter Sports Chompetition--a competition for athletes and their dogs! Will they be able to stop reigning champs Coldsnap and his dog Mr. Husky from cheating to win the gold?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough-Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library-Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van-Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday-Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Bubble Trouble-Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! He loves his journey soaring over the land - but his friends are desperate to rescue him!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Party Time-Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name... Anna finds the perfect name: Friendship party!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Orange Empire-The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday-Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep106
programme.desc: 123's with Blue-Count along with Josh & Blue in this game of Blue's Clues to find out what Blue wants to buy at the store. We help Shovel & Pail learn who has more graham crackers then help Josh discover what he can buy with his Blue dollars.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Gasquatch-Blaze and AJ are deep in the woods when they discover and befriend a mud-loving monster truck named Gasquatch. Now, they must set out on an epic adventure to bring their new friend to Mud Fest… the muddiest party of all time.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep812
programme.desc: Pups Save a Chicken Tulip / Pups Stop an Xtreme Shark-When Mayor Humdinger and his mother help Mayor Goodway look for a rare tulip, Humdinger's attempts to have his mom find the flower first gets them all in trouble. // The Pups must save Daring Danny X when a mechanical shark stunt that goes awry.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon-Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Fan Club / Speeding Steel-After Kai saves some baby turtles, they form a fan club. Full of himself, Kai tries to save the Central Forest from over-heating without his teammates. // Rammy wants to win the city marathon but he cannot keep up with Sir Steel's super sneakers!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Donut Panic-Rammy's tips on focus and meditation come in handy when Sir Steel's Replicator causes havoc in the Central Forest with giant donuts.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Paddington Runs the Café / Paddington Makes a Film-Paddington says he will watch the cafe, so Matteo can play with Jonathan and Judy in the park. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor Gardens to send to Aunt Lucy in the retired home for Bears in Lima.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Paddingtons Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist-Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday! // Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip-Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey-Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine-When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa-Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Puppy Love!-Bubble Puppy's got a cold! While Dr. Martin, the veterinarian, takes good care of him, the kids spend the day thinking about dogs-a Guppy's best friend. But will Gil's get-well card will help Bubble Puppy feel better?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Spring is Here!-It's getting warmer outside, and the flowers are blooming - that must mean that spring is here! We play an outdoors game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do on the first day of spring.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Blue Makes a Movie with YOU!-Josh and Blue are making a movie and they need YOUR help! We play Blue's Clues to figure out the ending of our movie- what will wake Magenta up after a magic flower makes her fall asleep? While looking for clues, we help Rapunzel make her own movie.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Space Alien Adventure!-Blaze and AJ make friends with a space alien named Gormy! But when Gormy's jetpack loses power, they set out to help him find six special space batteries so he can fly home to his alien family!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep999
programme.desc: Pirate Play Along Adventure-Santiago, Lorelai, and Tomás want YOU to join their crew! Play along to see if you have what it takes to be a good pirate.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost-Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's café, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S5) Ep7
programme.desc: Pasta - Dee encourages a friend to say 'pasta' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Today's episode is all about pasta.

programme.desc: I Spy - The voice trumpet leads a game of 'I Spy' where the Teletubbies have to spot different colours - purple, green, yellow and red. What or who can they spot with those colours?

programme.title: Clangers (S2) Ep24
programme.desc: The Other Iron Chicken - The Iron Chicken goes off on a trip to see the Wols. Tiny is missing her so the Soup Dragon comes up with a way to cheer Tiny up - she will pretend to be the Iron Chicken!

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep12
programme.desc: The Thing That Danced - A huge dinopaw blocks the friends' way into wiggly canyon, and won't let them pass until they learn a dance.

programme.desc: Frozen Out - Team Tinpo return home to their HQ to discover it stuck in the "locked" position! Will they stay "frozen out"?

programme.desc: Lunar Eclipzzz - Nelly has to help Nora stay awake long enough to see the Lunar eclipse.

programme.desc: Dog Loves Cheshire Cat - Dog and Pug go to Buckingham Palace where they meet Queen Victoria. She is looking for her mysterious Cheshire Cat, who keeps disappearing. Pug tempts him out with a saucer of cream.

programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Stop Those Superweeds - Some fast-growing plants that don't belong on Academy Island are in danger of taking over. Can the Go Jetters stop the superweed from damaging the Academy and Grim HQ?

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season Ep148
programme.desc: All the colour and excitement of AFL Grand Final Day - the biggest annual event on Australia's sporting calendar. The Geelong Cats will take on the Sydney Swans for the 2022 AFL Premiership Cup. The match starts 2.30pm AEST.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season Ep149
programme.desc: Global superstar Robbie Williams headlines the AFL Grand Final Pre-Match Entertainment. Also performing today are Goanna, Christine Anu, Emma Donovan, Tasman Keith, William Barton, G Flip, The Temper Trap and Katie Noonan.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season Ep150
programme.desc: The Geelong Cats have won 15 games in a row and finished the season on top of the ladder. In the AFL Grand Final they face the Sydney Swans, who knocked out the Magpies in the Preliminary final for their ninth straight win.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep77
programme.desc: Mariam Saab brings you the latest news following today's top stories and coverage of Australia's biggest annual sporting event, the AFL Grand Final.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep19
programme.desc: Missing for 40 years, Lyn Dawson's sister and brother never gave up hope they'd find justice. Behind the scenes as her siblings prepare for the outcome of her husband Chris Dawson's murder trial and digest the guilty verdict.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep39
programme.desc: Mariam Saab brings you the latest news following today's top stories and coverage of Australia's biggest annual sporting event, the AFL Grand Final.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - Jamie Durie is one of our most dynamic TV personalities. He's led an interesting life that has had its challenges. Can Anh capture his charisma and passion?

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep25
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Tino tours a home centred around courtyards; Jane focuses on ferns; Josh trellises citrus trees; Clarence learns about testing plants in public space; Jerry shares water management tips; Sophie visits a productive urban farm.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Host of Grand Designs Australia Peter Maddison meets Chris Clarke, who sets out to build a resilient version of his original home, which was destroyed in the Black Saturday bushfires.

programme.title: Escape From The City Ep52
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Brad and Monique yearn to escape the hustle and bustle of Sydney for a more relaxed rural home to raise their three children. Their search takes them to the charming hinterland of the NSW Mid North Coast.

programme.title: Fightback Farmers

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Anime Supernova
programme.desc: Sakai Osamu is a creator who incorporates complex historical and scientific information into easy-to-understand works of art, employing a variety of expressive techniques that change with each theme.

programme.title: Darwin'S Amazing Animals
programme.desc: "Born yesterday" has a very different meaning for Mandarin ducklings in the big city. Their second day of life is a rite-of-passage, avoiding crows and man-made hazards in search of the nearest pond.

programme.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo Mini
programme.desc: Shirasu are baby Japanese anchovies. Known for their clear, silvery-white appearance, these tiny things are packed with umami and nutrients.

programme.title: Today'S Close-Up

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: A Century On Film
programme.desc: From prosperity to depression, this episode explores the 1920s and beyond using rare footage of writer F. Scott Fitzgerald, and J.P. Morgan Jr. testifying to a Senate committee after the Great Crash.

programme.title: The Quest For Ancient Color
programme.desc: Japan's Classical period featured stunning natural colors and dyeing techniques. A fifth-generation Kyoto dye craftsman is rediscovering this tradition, resulting in a rich expression of hues.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Nishijin-ori, beauty synthesized in a Kyoto brocade. Dive deep into the beauty of the ancient capital, still innovative 1,200 years after its foundation.

programme.title: A World Of Boisterous Silence
programme.desc: Children who cannot hear learn through sign language at a Tokyo school. Their small hands weave together many words. This silent, boisterous world and the lives of alumni are shown, without narration.

programme.title: Spiritual Explorers: Shojin Ryori
programme.desc: We visit a Zen temple to learn about the philosophy of shojin ryori, an 800-year-old style of cuisine and Zen practice that uses no animal products.

programme.title: Framing Everyday Moments

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Crests are symbols of families and organizations. Once the privilege of the imperial and samurai classes, they were adopted by merchants and the populace as marks of pride.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: Seaside town Hakodate, located south of Hokkaido, is known as a good place to catch various types of fish. Our program host tries sea fishing, aiming to catch flatfish and squid.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Face To Face
programme.desc: Kusumi Masayuki is the author of the best-selling manga "The Solitary Gourmet." The story follows an ordinary man who dines alone in unpretentious eateries. What has led to the series' popularity?

programme.title: No Art, No Life Plus
programme.desc: Outsider artists like Baba Haruto are gaining recognition around the world. Although he creates mainly for himself, others have taken notice. See how these artists live and work.

programme.title: Dining With The Chef Mini
programme.desc: Featured recipe: Beef with Kombu Dashi Sauce Learn about Japanese home cooking with Master Chef Saito, based on traditional Japanese cooking techniques in five minutes!

programme.title: Doki Doki! NHK World-Japan
programme.desc: This time we introduce "Sharing the Future," which started this April. We show an episode presenting the activity of a Japanese in NPO making efforts to reduce educational disparities in Tanzania.
